rules.natural: Whenever the engineer improves the packaging, the business succeeds.
Provided that the system optimizes production, if the researcher develops the recipe, then the business succeeds.
The technician maintains the equipment or the technician calibrates the instruments.
Under the condition that the technician calibrates the instruments, the system optimizes production.
If the staff performs maintenance, then whenever the technician maintains the equipment, the system optimizes production.
Either the staff performs maintenance or the staff schedules maintenance.
Provided that the staff schedules maintenance, if the technician maintains the equipment, then the system optimizes production.
If the company implements green technology, then the company achieves sustainability goals.
If the product passes the safety test, then whenever the business does not succeed, the company does not use organic ingredients.
The product passes the safety test or the product meets the quality standard.
If the company receives a warning, then the company faces fines.
Provided that the team creates a novel product, the business succeeds.
If the team enhances an existing product, then the business succeeds.
The department allocates resources or the department secures funding.
Under the condition that the department secures funding, the team enhances an existing product.

Either the director intervenes early or, if the director monitors progress, then whenever it is not the case that if the department allocates resources then the team creates a novel product, the project does not experience delay.
Whenever the facility operates at capacity, the facility meets the production target.

The company expands operations, or if it is not the case that whenever it is not the case that whenever the business does not succeed then the process minimizes waste, the system increases efficiency, then the facility operates at capacity.
If HR hires specialists, then the lab conducts research.
HR hires specialists or the research department partners with universities.
Whenever the research department partners with universities, the company acquires technology.
Provided that the company acquires technology, the legal team files patents.
If the researchers publish findings, then under the condition that the researcher develops the recipe, the business succeeds.
Whenever the product has certification, if the business does not succeed, then the company does not use organic ingredients.
Provided that the legal team files patents, business development commercializes the innovation.
Under the condition that the compliance officer complies with regulations, if the company achieves sustainability goals, then the operation does not violate environmental regulations.
If the quality manager documents procedures, then the operations team implements controls.
The quality manager documents procedures or the HR manager trains staff.
Provided that the HR manager trains staff, if the compliance officer does not comply with regulations, then the company faces an audit.
If the auditor reviews systems, then under the condition that the operations team implements controls, the facility passes inspection.
The auditor reviews systems or the regulator verifies compliance.
Provided that the regulator verifies compliance, if the operations team implements controls, then the facility passes inspection.
The sustainability manager reports metrics or the analyst analyzes data.

If the analyst analyzes data, then under the condition that the eco officer monitors environmental impact, whenever it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the business does not succeed then the facility does not use renewable energy, the process does not reduce carbon footprint, the operation does not violate environmental regulations.

Provided that the consultant recommends improvements, if the sustainability manager reports metrics, then under the condition that the eco officer monitors environmental impact, whenever it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the business does not succeed then the facility does not use renewable energy, the process does not reduce carbon footprint, the operation does not violate environmental regulations.
